name: xMakeMoney
overview:
xMakeMoney is a blog for Startups, Business, Entrepreneurs and Investing. It provides guides for would-be entrepreneurs with step by step information on starting a new venture, getting funding and expanding the business. It has a section for small business ideas which helps peolpe start a new venture in their locality with minimum investment.

The xMakeMoney Community (the forum) also attempts to serve as a connection point for entrepreneurs from different parts of the world. People from different parts of the world can exhange ideas and get synergy from the experience of people from all walks of life.

There is also a section targeted towards day job professionals who would like to make money from their home. The marketplace in the forum attempts to serve as a connection point for those would like to leverage the power of the internet for outsourcing small tasks.
